meanings.definition: A machine that registers and indicates the total amount of bets placed on a race or other event.
meanings.sent1: The totalizators at the racetrack displayed the amount of money wagered on each horse.
meanings.sent2: Fans eagerly checked the totalizators to see which horse was the favorite to win.
meanings.sent3: The totalizators seemed to have a mind of their own, constantly updating with new bets.
meanings.sent4: The totalizators hummed softly, like a chorus of tiny calculators keeping track of the bets.
meanings.sent5: The totalizators glowed with numbers, creating an exciting atmosphere at the track.

meanings.definition: A system of betting in which all bets are pooled and divided among the winners.
meanings.sent1: In totalizator betting, the final payout depends on the number of winning tickets.
meanings.sent2: Totalizators ensure that all participants have a chance to share in the winnings.
meanings.sent3: The totalizators made splitting the prize money among the winners a breeze.
meanings.sent4: The totalizators turned the betting process into a cooperative game of chance.
meanings.sent5: The totalizators transformed individual bets into a collective pot of potential riches.
